act.title: Dialog Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.hanzi: 黑, 你好。你从食堂会来了?
item.pinyin: Hēi, nǐ hǎo. Nǐ cóng shítáng hui lai le?

item.hanzi: 对, 食堂的菜不错, 很 好吃。
item.pinyin: Duì, shítáng de cài bùcuò, hěn hǎo chī.
Wǒ zhù zài liúxuéshēng de sùshè.

item.hanzi: 宿舍很方便, 干净和安静。
item.pinyin: Sùshè hěn fāngbiàn, gānjìng hé ānjìng.
